title: PLZ HAVE MERCY RITO
body: I am saving up for {{champion:120}}  and i have 4400 ip. So i was just wondering if you could lend a homie like 100-200 ip u feel me?

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we cannot gift you IP. :(

Since you're so close, you could play a few quick ARAMs and pick up Hecarim in no time!

Let me know if you have any other questions.
